title: Summoner Name Change
body: When I first joined League, I wanted to make my summoner name Ganymede, one of the moons that orbit Jupiter. However, when I placed that name into the name checker, it said that name is not appropriate. I am taking a wild guess and thought that it detected gay in the name; _**Ga**_n_**y**_mede. I was wondering If I could change my name. Riot, please fix.

replies.body: Heya, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can check the availability and set it up for you manually.  If we're able to apply it, make sure to let the specialist know if you want to change it with BE or RP.
